Lord of the Skies.description: The Berserker calls upon his right as Lord of the Skies, increasing his Evasion, Movement Speed, and Attack Speed by EFFECT%. Additionally his Health Regeneration and Mana Regeneration is increased by |100%¥. Lasts DURATION seconds.
Lord of the Skies.name: Lord of the Skies

Call of the Dragon.description: The Berserker calls for the blessings of the Dragons, increasing all _ELI_Lightning¥ skills' base damage by EFFECT%, reducing their base cooldown by EFFECT%, and increasing Movement Speed by EFFECT%. Lasts DURATION seconds.
Call of the Dragon.name: Call of the Dragon

Thundering Roar.description_next: DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to all foes within RANGE meters.
Thundering Roar.description: The Berserker lets out a powerful roar, causing Thunder to strike all foes within RANGE meters, instantly dealing DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage.
Thundering Roar.name: Thundering Roar

Sky Lord.description: Each point spent in the |Sky Lord¥ tree grants you bonus stats. Current bonus: +DAMAGE% _ELI_Lightning¥ damage, +EFFECT% Overpower and Movement Speed.
Sky Lord.name: Sky Lord

Blitz.description_next: Attack Speed is increased by EFFECT% of the Berserker's current Rage.
Blitz.description: Attack Speed is increased by EFFECT% of the Berserker's current Rage.
Blitz.name: Blitz

Thunder Punch.description_next: DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to all foes in a RANGE meter line.
Thunder Punch.description: The Berserker throws a powerful punch that launches him RANGE meters forwards, smashing through all targets dealing DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage.
Thunder Punch.name: Thunder Punch

Lightning Wyrms.description_next: DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to each foe pulled. RANGE meter range. DURATION seconds provoke.
Lightning Wyrms.description: The Berserker shouts to summon a swarm of Lightning Wyrms, which rapidly reach out and grab all foes within RANGE meters, stunning them while moving them closer, ignoring any pull immunity. Foes pulled also become provoked for DURATION seconds, forcing them to attack the Berserker. Deals DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to each foe pulled.
Lightning Wyrms.name: Lightning Wyrms

Lightning Jab.description: The Berserker rapidly strikes foes in front of him twice, for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage in total. This skill should replace the default attack.
Lightning Jab.name: Lightning Jab

Dragon Flight.description_next: +EFFECT% of Rage to Movement Speed. |Use:¥ +EFFECT% Attack Speed for DURATION seconds.
Dragon Flight.description: When active in a slot, increases the Movement Speed by EFFECT% of current Rage. |Use:¥ Increase Attack Speed by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Dragon Flight.name: Dragon Flight

Spirit And Soul.description: REQUIRED has an extra PROC% chance to trigger |Dragon |Soul¥.
Spirit And Soul.name: Spirit And Soul

Dragon Soul.description_next: PROC% chance to summon, DAMAGE% of the trigering skill's damage dealt as _ELI_Lightning¥ damage.
Dragon Soul.description: While |Dragon |Spirit¥ is active, _ELI_Lightning¥ skills have a PROC% chance on hit to summon a |Dragon Soul¥. The |Dragon Soul¥ seeks out a random foe within RANGE meters and deals DAMAGE% of the triggering skill's damage dealt as _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to it.
Dragon Soul.name: Dragon Soul

Rush.description_next: Movement Speed is increased by EFFECT% of the Berserker's current Rage.
Rush.description: Movement Speed is increased by EFFECT% of the Berserker's current Rage.
Rush.name: Rush

Dragon's Grace.description: |Dragon |Soul¥ now also damages any foe it touches on the way to its target for the same amount of damage.
Dragon's Grace.name: Dragon's Grace

Storm Fists.description_next: Deals DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage per second to all foes within RANGE meters for DURATION seconds.
Storm Fists.description: The Berserker conjures fists of lightning to repeatedly strike all foes within RANGE meters of the Berserker. Deals DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage per second and lasts for DURATION seconds. This effect follows the Berserker.
Storm Fists.name: Storm Fists

Dragon Spirit.description_next: PROC% chance of +EFFECT% Mana Regeneration and Health Regeneration for DURATION seconds.
Dragon Spirit.description: Using _ELI_Lightning¥ skills has a PROC% chance to infuse the Berserker with the spirit of the dragon, increasing his Mana Regeneration and Health Regeneration by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Dragon Spirit.name: Dragon Spirit

Hustle.description_next: Using REQUIRED increases Movement Speed by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Hustle.description: Using REQUIRED increases Movement Speed by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Hustle.name: Hustle

Rumbling Voice.description_next: +EFFECT% of Rage to |Shout¥ skill damage. |Use:¥ Stun foes within RANGE meters for DURATION seconds.
Rumbling Voice.description: When active in a slot, increases the damage of all |Shout¥ skills by EFFECT% of current Rage. |Use:¥ Stuns foes within RANGE meters for DURATION seconds.
Rumbling Voice.name: Rumbling Voice

Sky Power.description_next: +EFFECT% of Rage to Overpower. |Use:¥ Adds |15%¥ chance on hit to cause DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ Chain Lightning damage on hit for DURATION seconds.
Sky Power.description: When active in a slot, increases Overpower by EFFECT% of current Rage. |Use:¥ Adds |15%¥ chance on hit to cause Chain Lightning for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage, for DURATION seconds.
Sky Power.name: Sky Power

Dive.description: The Berserker quickly rolls forwards through his foes at EFFECT% of his Movement Speed, up to RANGE meters.
Dive.name: Dive

Overload.description_next: Strikes all foes in a RANGE meter radius for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage. Chain lightning strikes up to |2¥ additional targets.
Overload.description: The Berserker overloads with electrical energy, striking each foe within RANGE meters for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage. Each target hit produces a chain lightning effect, striking up to |2¥ additional targets for half the initial damage.
Overload.name: Overload

Blessing of The Skies.description: Using REQUIRED increases the Mana Regeneration by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Blessing of The Skies.name: Blessing of The Skies

Electric Air.description: Increases the range of REQUIRED by EFFECT%.
Electric Air.name: Electric Air

Spirit Link.description_next: PROC% chance to trigger, slow up to VALUE foes within RANGE meters of target by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Spirit Link.description: Foes struck by _ELI_Lightning¥ skills have a PROC% chance to create a |Spirit Link¥ with up to VALUE foes within RANGE meters, slowing them by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds. Foes who are hosts or linked to hosts cannot be affected by another |Spirit Link¥.
Spirit Link.name: Spirit Link

Soul Link.description: |Spirit |Link¥ now also transfers DAMAGE% of damage taken by the host to all their links.
Soul Link.name: Soul Link

Amplified.description: Increases the damage of the Chain Lightning effects generated by REQUIRED by DAMAGE%.
Amplified.name: Amplified

Dragon's Might.description: |Dragon |Soul¥ has a PROC% chance to trigger |Explosive |Manoeuvres¥ on its target foe, if you have the skill in the |Dragonkin¥ skill tree. The damage of the |Explosive |Manoeuvres¥ effect is based on the damage of |Dragon |Soul¥.
Dragon's Might.name: Dragon's Might

Shout Blast.description_next: Blast foes within RANGE meters up to RANGE2 meters away.
Shout Blast.description: The Berserker lets out a powerful shout, blasting foes within RANGE meters up to RANGE2 meters away from him.
Shout Blast.name: Shout Blast

Thunder Slam.description: The Berserker slams the ground hard, causing Thunder to strike foes in front of him for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage. This skill should replace the default attack.
Thunder Slam.name: Thunder Slam

Bloodline.description_next: Increases the effect of all |Heritage¥ skills by EFFECT%.
Bloodline.description: Increases the effect of all |Heritage¥ skills by EFFECT%.
Bloodline.name: Bloodline

Hop.description: The Berserker hops away rapidly, leaping up RANGE meters. Can cross voids and pillars.
Hop.name: Hop

Deafening Voice.description: Increases the range of all |Shout¥ skills by EFFECT%.
Deafening Voice.name: Deafening Voice

Dragon Storm.description_next: |3¥ Dragons, DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage dealt to any foes touched, lasts DURATION seconds. Max VALUE dragons.
Dragon Storm.description: The Berserker calls for |3¥ _ELI_Lightning¥ Dragons to circle him for DURATION seconds, dealing DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to any foes they touch. The Dragons follow the Berserker, and can each damage the same target once per loop. Up to VALUE dragons can circle the berserker at any time.
Dragon Storm.name: Dragon Storm

Booming Voice.description_next: Increases the damage of all |Shout¥ type skills by EFFECT%.
Booming Voice.description: Increases the damage of all |Shout¥ type skills by EFFECT%.
Booming Voice.name: Booming Voice

Supercharged.description_next: +EFFECT% Critical Hit Chance for DURATION seconds.
Supercharged.description: Using REQUIRED increases the Critical Hit Chance by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Supercharged.name: Supercharged

Voice of the Dragons.description: The Berserker claims the Voice of the Dragons, increasing the base damage of all |Shout¥ skills by DAMAGE%, and their range by EFFECT%. Additionally, their base cooldown is reduced by EFFECT%. Lasts DURATION seconds.
Voice of the Dragons.name: Voice of the Dragons

Lightning Fist.description_next: DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to all foes in a straight line up to RANGE meters long. Chain lightning strikes up to |2¥ additional targets.
Lightning Fist.description: The Berserker conjures and fires a fist of lightning, dealing DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to all foes hit in a straight line. Each target hit produces a chain lightning effect, striking up to |2¥ additional targets for half the initial damage. Fist travels up to RANGE meters.
Lightning Fist.name: Lightning Fist

Dexterity.description_next: Movement Speed increased by EFFECT% of current Rage.
Dexterity.description: REQUIRED also adds Movement Speed equal to EFFECT% of the Berserker's current Rage.
Dexterity.name: Dexterity

Arc Punch.description_next: Strike foes in a RANGE meter radius in front of the Berserker for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage. Chain lightning strikes up to |2¥ additional targets.
Arc Punch.description: The Berserker strikes foes in a RANGE meter radius in front of him for DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage. Each target hit produces a chain lightning effect, striking up to |2¥ additional targets for half the initial damage.
Arc Punch.name: Arc Punch

Charged Up.description_next: Using REQUIRED increases Damage by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Charged Up.description: Using REQUIRED increases Damage by EFFECT% for DURATION seconds.
Charged Up.name: Charged Up

Dragon Warp.description_next: DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to all foes within RANGE2 meters of his teleport location, up to RANGE meters away.
Dragon Warp.description: The Berserker instantly moves to his target location, up to RANGE meters away, dealing DAMAGE% XDAM _ELI_Lightning¥ damage to all foes within RANGE2 meters on arrival.
Dragon Warp.name: Dragon Warp
